verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, unto Aaron אַתָּ֗ה <WH859> 'at-Tah, You וּבָנֶ֤יךָ <WH1121> u-va-Nei-cha Thou and thy sons וּבֵית־ <WH1004> u-veit- house אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha and thy father's אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> 'it-Tach, for תִּשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> tis-'U with thee shall bear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> 'a-Von the iniquity הַמִּקְדָּ֑שׁ <WH4720> ham-mik-Dash; of the sanctuary וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> ve-'at-Tah and you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <WH1121> u-va-Nei-cha and thou and thy sons אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> 'it-Tach, for תִּשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> tis-'U with thee shall bear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> 'a-Von the iniquity כְּהֻנַּתְכֶֽם׃ <WH3550> ke-hun-nat-Chem. of your priesthood

וְזֶה־ <WH2088> ve-zeh- This לְּךָ֞ le-Cha תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> te-ru-Mat And this [is] thine the heave offering מַתָּנָ֗ם <WH4976> mat-ta-Nam, of their gift לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all תְּנוּפֹת֮ <WH8573> te-nu-Fot with all the wave offerings בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְךָ֣ le-Cha נְתַתִּ֗ים <WH5414> ne-tat-Tim, I have given וּלְבָנֶ֧יךָ <WH1121> u-le-va-Nei-cha them unto thee and to thy sons וְלִבְנֹתֶ֛יךָ <WH1323> ve-liv-no-Tei-cha and to thy daughters אִתְּךָ֖ <WH854> 'it-te-Cha for לְחָק־ <WH2706> le-chok- with thee by a statute עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> o-Lam; for ever כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- Everyone טָה֥וֹר <WH2889> ta-Hor every one that is clean בְּבֵיתְךָ֖ <WH1004> be-vei-te-Cha in thy house יֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> yo-Chal shall eat אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> o-To.
